group_1.narration: I knew that if I wanted to get out there and live,@I couldn't be who I was then,@so I created a false self.
A nice, stylish hero with a big smile...

group_1.textRight: Are you okay? Does it hurt anywhere?
I'm just a hero of justice, lol.
Even if you're just on your way home from cram@school, it's not safe to be alone at this hour.
Why don't you hurry on home?

group_1.narration: It was hard for me to keep up a character that was@completely different from who I really am.
So I decided to be an elusive hero and hunt Witches alone.
But before I knew it,@the Witches were getting stronger and stronger.@One day, I ran out of magic power while fighting one@and almost became a Witch myself...
That was when my Doppel first emerged and@I was invited to the Wings of Magius.
At the time,@I was able to turn them down,@but the truth about Magical Girls gnawed away at my heart@with each passing day, and I began to curse it all...

group_1.textCenter: (How is it that we have such a heavy destiny,@yet no one knows about it...?)
(We deserve more recognition from the people@around us.)
(And then, if I gain confidence, I'll be able to be@who I want to be someday...)

group_1.narration: If I can let people know that I'm hunting Witches,@and they give me courage,@I can walk with my head held high@without pretending to be something I'm not.
But soon,@I realized that what everyone was praising@was just my false self.@I was still a helpless, pathetic person.
Because no matter how much I risked my life,@no one would ever praise the real me...
